sentences.sContent: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.sCn: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

synos.tran: [生理]同化；吸收；[地质][生化]同化作用

phrases.pCn: 氮同化；氮素同化；氮素同化作用

words.tran: 同化的；同化力的；同化作用的
吸收；使同化；把…比作；使相似

trans.tranCn: 同化， 同化作用； 消化
trans.tranOther: the process of becoming an accepted part of a country or group
